snippet: The soprano Anna Netrebko, absent from the first two performances of “L’Elisir d’Amore” at the Met, arrived to inhabit the leading role fully on Friday.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews Metropolitan Opera production of Donizetti’s L’Elisir d’Amore, starring soprano Anna Netrebko.
lead_paragraph: The soprano Anna Netrebko, absent from the first two performances of “L’Elisir d’Amore” at the Met, arrived to inhabit the leading role fully on Friday.

headline.seo: Anna Netrebko in Bel Canto Mode, for ‘L’Elisir d’Amore’
